sentences: Leikkaus kesti vain kymmenen minuutin ajan.
Lääkäri varmisti, että leikkaus sujui onnistuneesti.
context: The word 'leikkaus' refers to a medical procedure involving the cutting or opening of a body part to treat an injury, disease, or deformity. It is commonly used in contexts related to hospital procedures and can also refer to cosmetic surgeries.
